title: NFL’s COVID-19 Plans and Recap From the Franchise Tag Deadline | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Kevin is joined by NFL Network’s Tom Pelissero to talk about everything you need to know about how the NFL plans to launch a season during a pandemic. Then The Ringer’s Nora Princiotti and Kaelen Jones join Kevin to talk about the news from franchise tag deadline day. 
Host: Kevin Clark
Guest: Tom Pelissero, Nora Princiotti, and Kaelen Jones
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
